articles.author: Eoghan Moloney
articles.title: Vaccine rollout Ireland: Vaccine boost for Ireland as Pfizer gets go-ahead for increased production at EU plant - Independent.ie
articles.description: Ireland will receive an “immediate” vaccine boost after it was announced that a plant in Belgium will increase its output of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine to the European Union.
articles.content:
Ireland will receive an immediate vaccine boost after it was announced that a plant in Belgium will increase its output of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine to the European Union.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Lingard among six dropped by England from final Euro squad - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     England manager Gareth Southgate named four right backs including Trent Alexander-Arnold in his final 26-man squad for the European championship on Tuesday after dropping in-form attacking midfielder Jesse Lingard and five other players.

articles.author: Reuters Inc.
articles.title: Poland to vaccinate 12-year-olds, join EU COVID certificate scheme | Saltwire - SaltWire Network
articles.description:
WARSAW (Reuters) -Poland will offer COVID-19 vaccinations to children aged 12-15 from June 7 and is also joining an EU certificate scheme to make travel easier, ministers said on Tuesday.
